answers.answer: Talk to a doctor, I have no idea what to tell you. Pregnancy is full of weird pains, we're just mom's/mom's to be not like we can give you a diagnosis.
You had a reply just wasn't what you wanted to hear. Seems like you already saw the Dr and everything is fine. There is no explanation if the Dr said everything is fine

I understand no one is a doctor, but I'm just seeing if anyone has experienced this obviously. Not all doctors especially male doctors can understand aha, I even asked the nurse in labor and delivery yesterday and she had no answer.. Thanks anyways
Try a chiropractor they help a lot as well. There's a thing as a prenatal visit with them
I never said I saw a doctor? I saw a nurse for leakage and contractions something completely different. I obviously want to know if other moms have experienced this and know what it is. That is all

The reply stated that it could be preeclampsia and to contact my doctor, an EKG test is to test preeclampsia which everything was normal. I got the test due to high blood pressure and my mom having it with all four pregnancies.. Had nothing or do with this pain and started way after my testing

question: so im posting this again...HELP!so I keep getting this horrible pain in my top right rib.It even makes my skin feel like a burn. I get that my ribs are sore from him constantly kicking but this feels a lot weirder and it's only the top right. It's a burning feeling. Plus I know it can't be that sore because he kicks my left ribs more than my right and they are fine. His head is near my right hip and his feet are in my left ribs. Ugh
title: No Replies
